en.your_journey_to_better_health_starts_her: Your journey to better health starts here
en.expert_care_description: Professional healthcare services with experienced medical practitioners
en.quality_service_description: Committed to providing the highest quality healthcare services
en.24_7_support_description: Round-the-clock medical assistance and emergency services
en.about_description: We are dedicated to providing comprehensive healthcare services to promote wellness and improve quality of life for our community.
en.mission_description: To deliver exceptional healthcare services with compassion, integrity, and excellence. We strive to be the trusted healthcare partner for individuals and families in our community.
en.mission_description_2: Our team of experienced healthcare professionals is committed to providing personalized care that meets the unique needs of each patient.
en.services_description: Comprehensive healthcare services designed to meet all your medical needs.
en.general_consultation_description: Comprehensive health assessments and medical consultations for all ages.
en.health_screening_description: Preventive health screenings and early detection services.
en.specialist_care_description: Access to specialist doctors for advanced medical conditions.
en.vaccination_description: Complete immunization services for children and adults.
en.emergency_care_description: 24/7 emergency medical services and urgent care.
en.laboratory_services_description: Complete diagnostic and laboratory testing services.
en.contact_description: Get in touch with us for appointments, inquiries, or emergency services.
en.nutrition_description: Expert nutrition guidance and meal planning for optimal health
en.balanced_diet_description: Learn about proper nutrition and balanced meal planning
en.meal_planning_description: Personalized meal plans tailored to your health goals
en.weight_management_description: Science-based approaches to healthy weight management
en.sports_nutrition_description: Specialized nutrition plans for athletes and active individuals
en.dietary_supplements_description: Guidance on safe and effective supplement use
en.workout_description: Comprehensive fitness programs and exercise guidance
en.personal_training_description: One-on-one training with certified fitness professionals
en.group_classes_description: Energetic group fitness classes for all fitness levels
en.strength_training_description: Build muscle and increase strength with expert guidance
en.cardio_fitness_description: Improve cardiovascular health with tailored cardio programs
en.flexibility_yoga_description: Enhance flexibility and find balance through yoga practice
en.rehabilitation_description: Therapeutic exercises for injury recovery and prevention

ms.your_journey_to_better_health_starts_her: Perjalanan anda ke kesihatan yang lebih bermula di sini
ms.expert_care_description: Perkhidmatan penjagaan kesihatan profesional dengan pengamal perubatan yang berpengalaman
ms.quality_service_description: Komited untuk menyediakan perkhidmatan kesihatan berkualiti tertinggi
ms.24_7_support_description: Bantuan perubatan dan perkhidmatan kecemasan sepanjang masa
ms.about_description: Kami komited untuk menyediakan perkhidmatan penjagaan kesihatan komprehensif untuk menggalakkan kesejahteraan dan meningkatkan kualiti hidup komuniti kami.
ms.mission_description: Untuk menyampaikan perkhidmatan penjagaan kesihatan yang luar biasa dengan belas kasihan, integriti, dan kecemerlangan. Kami berusaha untuk menjadi rakan penjagaan kesihatan yang dipercayai untuk individu dan keluarga dalam komuniti kami.
ms.mission_description_2: Pasangan profesional penjagaan kesihatan yang berpengalaman kami komited untuk menyediakan penjagaan yang dipersonalisasi yang memenuhi keperluan unik setiap pesakit.
ms.services_description: Perkhidmatan penjagaan kesihatan komprehensif yang direka untuk memenuhi semua keperluan perubatan anda.
ms.general_consultation_description: Penilaian kesihatan komprehensif dan konsultasi perubatan untuk semua peringkat umur.
ms.health_screening_description: Saringan kesihatan pencegahan dan perkhidmatan pengesanan awal.
ms.specialist_care_description: Akses kepada doktor pakar untuk keadaan perubatan lanjutan.
ms.vaccination_description: Perkhidmatan imunisasi lengkap untuk kanak-kanak dan dewasa.
ms.emergency_care_description: Perkhidmatan perubatan kecemasan 24/7 dan penjagaan segera.
ms.laboratory_services_description: Perkhidmatan ujian diagnostik dan makmal lengkap.
ms.contact_description: Hubungi kami untuk temujanji, pertanyaan, atau perkhidmatan kecemasan.
ms.nutrition_description: Bimbingan pemakanan pakar dan perancangan makanan untuk kesihatan optimum
ms.balanced_diet_description: Pelajari tentang pemakanan yang betul dan perancangan makanan seimbang
ms.meal_planning_description: Rancangan makanan yang dipersonalisasi disesuaikan dengan matlamat kesihatan anda
ms.nutrition_counseling_description: Bimbingan satu lawan satu dengan pakar pemakanan bertauliah
ms.weight_management_description: Pendekatan berasaskan sains untuk pengurusan berat badan yang sihat
ms.sports_nutrition_description: Rancangan pemakanan khusus untuk atlet dan individu aktif
ms.dietary_supplements_description: Bimbingan mengenai penggunaan makanan tambahan yang selamat dan berkesan
ms.workout_description: Program kecergasan komprehensif dan bimbingan senaman
ms.personal_training_description: Latihan satu lawan satu dengan profesional kecergasan bertauliah
ms.group_classes_description: Kelas kecergasan berkumpulan yang bertenaga untuk semua tahap kecergasan
ms.strength_training_description: Bina otot dan tingkatkan kekuatan dengan bimbingan pakar
ms.cardio_fitness_description: Tingkatkan kesihatan kardiovaskular dengan program kardio yang disesuaikan
ms.flexibility_yoga_description: Tingkatkan kelenturan dan cari keseimbangan melalui amalan yoga
ms.rehabilitation_description: Latihan terapeutik untuk pemulihan dan pencegahan kecederaan
